title: LAS Peak Learning Experiences Fund
description: To support and enhance the student research & internship programs at UCCS in the College of Letters, Arts and Sciences including but not limited to supporting the Service Learning Internship & Community Engagement Center and Peak Learning Experiences.
marketingContent: To support and enhance the student research & internship programs at UCCS in the College of Letters, Arts and Sciences including but not limited to supporting the Service Learning Internship & Community Engagement Center and Peak Learning Experiences.
